lu.uni.geko.weaver.remove
Class Remover

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.weaver.remove.Remover

public final class Remover
extends Object

A utility class for removing base elements and invalid references after weaving an advice.

Constructor Summary
private Remover()
          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.
 
Method Summary
private static boolean addToInconsistentObjectsIfLowerBoundViolated(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject referencingBaseElement, Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> inconsistentElementsToRemove, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature referencingFeature, int currentMultiplicity)
          Adds the given base element that references a removed element to the set containing all inconsistent elements to be removed if the given current multiplicity of the given reference violates the lower bound of the reference.
static void performRemovals(AdviceEffectuation avEffectuation)
          Removes the base elements that have to be removed during the given advice effectuation from their containers and their model.
private static void removeElements(Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> baseElementsToRemove)
          Removes the given base elements from their containers and their model.
private static Pair<Boolean,Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject>> removeReferencesAndInconsitencies(Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> baseElementsToRemove)
          Removes references to elements that have been removed and removes elements that do not conform to their metamodel anymore because of removed elements.

Method Detail

performRemovals

public static void performRemovals(AdviceEffectuation avEffectuation)
Removes the base elements that have to be removed during the given advice effectuation from their containers and their model.

Parameters:
avEffectuation - an advice effectuation

removeElements

private static void removeElements(Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> baseElementsToRemove)
Removes the given base elements from their containers and their model.

Parameters:
baseElementsToRemove - the base elements to be removed

removeReferencesAndInconsitencies

private static Pair<Boolean,Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject>> removeReferencesAndInconsitencies(Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> baseElementsToRemove)
Removes references to elements that have been removed and removes elements that do not conform to their metamodel anymore because of removed elements.

Parameters:
baseElementsToRemove - the base elements to be removed
Returns:
a pair containing the information whether a change occured and a set containing the inconsistent elements to be removed

addToInconsistentObjectsIfLowerBoundViolated

private static boolean addToInconsistentObjectsIfLowerBoundViolated(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject referencingBaseElement,
                                                                    Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> inconsistentElementsToRemove,
                                                                    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature referencingFeature,
                                                                    int currentMultiplicity)
Adds the given base element that references a removed element to the set containing all inconsistent elements to be removed if the given current multiplicity of the given reference violates the lower bound of the reference.

Parameters:
referencingBaseElement - a base element referencing a removed base element
inconsistentElementsToRemove - the set containing the inconsistent elements to be removed
referencingFeature - the feature of the given base element that references the removed base element
currentMultiplicity - the current multiplicity of the given reference
Returns:
whether a change occured (i.e. the referencing base element was identified as inconsistent)
